Strompris API¶

Fetch data from https://www.hvakosterstrommen.no/strompris-api and visualize it.

Assignment 5

strompris.fetch_day_prices(date: date = None, location: str = 'NO1') → DataFrame¶

Fetch one day of data for one location from hvakosterstrommen.no API

Parameters:

  • date (datetime.date, optional) – the day to fetch prices for

  • location (str, optional) – the location to fetch prices for

Returns:

A pandas dataframe with the prices for the given date and location

Return type:

df (pd.DataFrame)

strompris.fetch_prices(end_date: date = None, days: int = 7, locations: list[str] = ('NO1', 'NO2', 'NO3', 'NO4', 'NO5')) → DataFrame¶

Fetch prices for multiple days and locations into a single DataFrame

Parameters:

  • end_date (datetime.date, optional) – the last day to fetch prices for

  • days (int, optional) – number of days since end_date to fetch prices for

  • locations (list[str], optional) – the locations to fetch prices for

Returns:

A pandas dataframe with the prices for the period defined by end_date and days at the locations specified

Return type:

df (pd.DataFrame)

strompris.plot_prices(df: DataFrame) → Chart¶

Plot energy prices over time

x-axis should be time_start y-axis should be price in NOK each location should get its own line

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – A DataFrame with prices

Returns:

A chart displaying the prices of the DataFrame

Return type:

chart (alt.chart)

strompris.zero_pad(n: str) → str¶

zero-pad a number string - turns ‘2’ into ‘02’

Parameters:

n (str) – A string (representing a number) that may or may not be zero padded

Returns:

A string that is zero-padded

Return type:

string (str)
